answerText: : Ford Maddox Ford or Ford Hermann Hueffer [10] Ford may be best known for this novel, originally titled The Saddest Story and told mostly in flashbacks, about two seemingly perfect couples before World War I.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Brown University and Notre Dame | 4 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: His novel Ladies Whose Bright Eyes sought to portray a 'reversal' of Twain's Connecticut Yankee. FTPE: [10] Name this English novelist, author of Parade's End and a biography about his painter grandfather.
